pages.text: Yahlifuna Billahi Lakum Liyurđukum Wa Allahu Wa Rasuluhu 'Ahaqqu 'An Yurđuhu 'In Kanu Mu'uminina
Alam Ya`lamu 'Annahu Man Yuhadidi Allaha Wa Rasulahu Fa'anna Lahu Nara Jahannama Khalidaan Fiha Dhalika Al-Khizyu Al-`Azimu
Yahdharu Al-Munafiquna 'An Tunazzala `Alayhim Suratun Tunabbi'uhum Bima Fi Qulubihim Quli Astahzi'u 'Inna Allaha Mukhrijun Ma Tahdharuna
Wa La'in Sa'altahum Layaqulunna 'Innama Kunna Nakhuđu Wa Nal`abu Qul 'Abialllahi Wa 'Ayatihi Wa Rasulihi Kuntum Tastahzi'una
La Ta`tadhiru Qad Kafartum Ba`da 'Imanikum 'In Na`fu `An Ta'ifatin Minkum Nu`adhib Ta'ifatan Bi'annahum Kanu Mujrimina
Al-Munafiquna Wa Al-Munafiqatu Ba`đuhum Min Ba`đin Ya'muruna Bil-Munkari Wa Yanhawna `Ani Al-Ma`rufi Wa Yaqbiđuna 'Aydiyahum Nasu Allaha Fanasiyahum 'Inna Al-Munafiqina Humu Al-Fasiquna
Wa`ada Allahu Al-Munafiqina Wa Al-Munafiqati Wa Al-Kuffara Nara Jahannama Khalidina Fiha Hiya Hasbuhum Wa La`anahumu Allahu Wa Lahum `Adhabun Muqimun
